attributes.action: impose immediate and effective immigration controls and voluntary repatriation, as an alternative solution to road pricing.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Prime Minister, and indeed, the political establishment appear to be of the view that road congestion is a naturally occuring phenomenon, and can only be curbed by road pricing.
It is not, - it is at the very least, partly a consequence of this government's mass immigration policy which has added millions more drivers to our roads in far too short a time.
I propose a policy of controlled population numbers as the preferred solution to congestion and general overcrowding.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
